LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Militarum_Penal_Legion.baseD: [PAWN_nameDef] signed up to join the ranks of the penal legion. The Imperial Guard found that [PAWN_nameDef] was unfit for duty in the Imperial Guard, so they remained on their homeworld.
